acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, WeTransfer offers a completely free plan with no account required. You can send files up to 2GB total per transfer, and files are stored for 7 days.

mainEntity.name: What are the limitations of WeTransfer free?

acceptedAnswer.text: WeTransfer Free limits include: 2GB maximum per transfer, 7-day storage duration, no password protection, no transfer history, and no custom backgrounds.

mainEntity.name: How long do WeTransfer free files last?

acceptedAnswer.text: Files sent via WeTransfer Free are available for download for 7 days. After this period, they are automatically deleted and cannot be recovered.

mainEntity.name: Can I extend WeTransfer free storage time?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, WeTransfer Free files automatically expire after 7 days. To keep files longer, upgrade to WeTransfer Pro (28 days) or use WetoDrive to save files permanently to Google Drive.
